summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for administration of the Community Development Block Grant Program for the grant year commencing July 1, 1977 through December 31, 1977; establishing certain positions for the administration of said Program in the Executive Department, Office of Policy Planning, the Department of Community Development, Public Health, Human Resources and Finance; increasing certain Objects of expenditure in the 1977 Budgets of said Departments and the Engineering Department; authorizing interdepartmental and other agreements for effectuation of said Program; making an appropriation for administrative costs from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund; and allocating appropriated funds to City Departments.
